page.title: 19MY PONY SOPHIE
page.content: Sophie is 13.HH eight years old dapple grey mare.She has got a full white mane and tail, and when she walks she holds her tail up and curls her head in.She's half Arab,and bomb proof in traffic and an all-rounder.She is very good at dressage when she doesn't want to jump.I've jumped three foot and two inches on her but she can jump at least four foot or more.She's very flighty and sometimes likes to canter on the road.At summer Sophie is grass kept but in winter she is stabled at night.In summer I give Sophie two flaps of hay and some carrots,and some turnip.In winter she has four flaps of hay and a feed a day and sometimes when you do up her girth she sometimes nips. by Jayne Herzberg.
